reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 659/20: EXEMPTIONS UNDER SECTION 27 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXEMPTIONS UNDER SECTION 27 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Protecting a Sustainable Public Sector for Future Generations Act, 2019

content.content: 1. The collective agreement between Participation House Project Durham and Canadian Union of Public Employees Local 2936.01, which was reached after June 5, 2019 and is in operation from April 1, 2018 to March 31, 2022, is exempt from the application of the Act.
content.raw_html: 1. The collective agreement between Participation House Project Durham and Canadian Union of Public Employees Local 2936.01, which was reached after June 5, 2019 and is in operation from April 1, 2018 to March 31, 2022, is exempt from the application of the Act.

content.section: Exemptions, Brant Family and Children’s Services and CUPE
content.content: 2. (1) The collective agreement between Brant Family and Children’s Services and the Canadian Union of Public Employees, Local 181.02, which is in operation from April 1, 2021 to March 31, 2022, is exempt from the application of the Act. O. Reg. 505/22, s. 1. (2) The collective agreement between Brant Family and Children’s Services and the Canadian Union of Public Employees, Local 181.15, which is in operation from April 1, 2021 to March 31, 2022, is exempt from the application of the Act. O. Reg. 505/22, s. 1.  Français
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The collective agreement between Brant Family and Children’s Services and the Canadian Union of Public Employees, Local 181.02, which is in operation from April 1, 2021 to March 31, 2022, is exempt from the application of the Act. O. Reg. 505/22, s. 1.

(2) The collective agreement between Brant Family and Children’s Services and the Canadian Union of Public Employees, Local 181.15, which is in operation from April 1, 2021 to March 31, 2022, is exempt from the application of the Act. O. Reg. 505/22, s. 1.
